titleStmt.title: Here begynnyth a traetys callyde the Lordis flayle handlyde by the bushops powre thresshere Thomas Solme
titleStmt.author: Some, Thomas, b. ca. 1510.

publicationStmt.publisher: By me Theophyll Emlos, vndere the sygne of sente Peters kay [i.e. widow of C. Ruremund,

notesStmt.note: The imprint in the colophon is false; actual place of publication, printer's name, and suggested publication date from STC. The printer's name is the author's name spelled backwards (STC).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: me Theophyll Emlos, vndere the sygne of sente Peters kay [i.e. widow of C. Ruremund
